scripts.html: echo '=> creating static html files' && cp client/src/index.html _dist/
scripts.css: echo '=> converting less to css' &&  lessc client/src/styles/style.less _dist/styles/style.css
scripts.js: echo '=> making js files ready for browser' && browserify client/src/js/betreiber.js client/src/js/loadShows.js -o _dist/js/main.js
scripts.minify: echo '=> minify all ressources' && terser _dist/js/main.js -o _dist/js/main.js && css-minify -d _dist/styles/ -o _dist/styles/
scripts.clean: echo '=> cleaning project' && rm -rf node_modules && npm run cleardist
scripts.build: echo '=> building project' && npm run cleardist && npm run html &&  npm run css && npm run js && npm run minify
scripts.debug: echo '=> building debug project' && npm run lint && npm run cleardist && npm run html && npm run css && npm run js
